tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MarketReports (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    report_title VARCHAR(255),
    report_description TEXT,
    report_date TIMESTAMP,
    investment_opportunity BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE MarketTrendsReports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_name VARCHAR(255),
  report_date DATE,
  report_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE InvestmentOpportunities (
  opportunity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  opportunity_name VARCHAR(255),
  opportunity_type VARCHAR(50),
  opportunity_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE report_investments (
 report_id INT,
 opportunity_id INT,
 investment_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
 FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES market_reports(report_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (opportunity_id) REFERENCES investment_opportunities(opportunity_id)
);

CREATE TABLE market_trends (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    report_name VARCHAR(255),
    publication_date DATE,
    author_name VARCHAR(100),
    report_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE investment_opportunities (
    opportunity_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    opportunity_name VARCHAR(255),
    industry_sector VARCHAR(100),
    investment_type VARCHAR(100),
    investment_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE company_profiles (
    company_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(255),
    industry_sector VARCHAR(100),
    founded_date DATE,
    ceo_name VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE analysis_data (
    analysis_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id UUID REFERENCES market_trends(report_id),
    company_id UUID REFERENCES company_profiles(company_id),
    opportunity_id UUID REFERENCES investment_opportunities(opportunity_id),
    analysis_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE market_trends (
  report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  report_name VARCHAR(100),
  report_date DATE,
  market_trend TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE investment_opportunities (
  opportunity_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  opportunity_name VARCHAR(100),
  opportunity_type VARCHAR(50),
  investment_amount DECIMAL(12,2),
  investment_deadline DATE
)

CREATE TABLE market_analysis (
  analysis_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  analysis_type VARCHAR(50),
  analysis_date DATE,
  analysis_result TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE investor_profiles (
  investor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  investor_name VARCHAR(100),
  investor_type VARCHAR(50),
  investor_location VARCHAR(100),
  investment_interests TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE investment_history (
  investment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  investor_id UUID,
  opportunity_id UUID,
  investment_date DATE,
  investment_amount DECIMAL(12,2)
)
